sentences.en: a marginal improvement in profits
sentences.cn: 利润的小幅提高

sentences.en: a marginal improvement in weather conditions
sentences.cn: 天气条件的略微好转

sentences.en: a marginal increase in the unemployment figures
sentences.cn: 失业人数的小幅增加

sentences.en: British Guiana, however, was a marginal problem.
sentences.cn: 可是, 英属圭亚那仍然极不稳定.

sentences.en: Diminishing marginal utility also expresses a " variety is the spice of life ".
sentences.cn: 边际效用递减也表现为一种 “ 多样化是生活乐趣 ”.

sentences.en: For low-paid workers, the marginal tax rate is at least 75%.
sentences.cn: 对于低收入的工人来说，边际税率至少为75%。

sentences.en: He won the most marginal seat by only two votes.
sentences.cn: 他只以两票的微弱优势当选.

sentences.en: High marginal tax rates may act as a disincentive to working longer hours.
sentences.cn: 高额的边际税率可能会对加班起到抑制作用。

sentences.en: I don't want to call him marginal, but he's not a major character.
sentences.cn: 我不想说他是个小人物，可他也不是什么大人物。

sentences.en: marginal groups in society
sentences.cn: 社会中的非主流群体

sentences.en: marginal notes
sentences.cn: 边注（旁注）

sentences.en: marginal revenue
sentences.cn: 边际收益

sentences.en: That's the views of voters in five marginal seats.
sentences.cn: 那就是选民对5个边缘席位的看法。

sentences.en: The analysts applaud the cuts in marginal businesses, but insist the company must make deeper sacrifices.
sentences.cn: 分析家们赞同削减边缘业务，但坚持认为公司必须作出更大牺牲。

sentences.en: The marginal illustration is very interesting.
sentences.cn: 页边的插图很有趣.

sentences.en: The new law will have only a marginal effect on the lives of most people.
sentences.cn: 新法律对大多数人的生活不会有重大的影响.

sentences.en: The poor are forced to farm in more marginal lands higher up the mountains.
sentences.cn: 穷人们被迫在山峦更高处的更为贫瘠的土地上耕作。

sentences.en: The unconformity marks the change from fluvial to marginal marine deposition.
sentences.cn: 不整合面标志着河相至边缘海相沉积的相变.

sentences.en: There has been a marginal improvement in the firm's sales.
sentences.cn: 商行的销路稍有好转.

sentences.en: There's only a marginal difference between the two estimates.
sentences.cn: 这两种估计差别很小.

words.tran_cn: 少量地；最低限度地；在栏外；在页边
边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白
排斥；忽视；使处于社会边缘；使脱离社会发展进程

phrases.tran_cn: 边际成本（经济学专有名词）
缘带；边缘区；[经]产油枯竭带

trans.tran_cn: 边的，边缘的，旁注的，临界的，最低限度的，收入仅敷支出的
trans.tran_en: not part of a main or important group or situation

trans.tran_cn: （议会或地方委员会的）边缘席位
